code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{signInWithGithub}from"../firebase";import{FontAwesomeIcon}from"@fortawesome/react-fontawesome";import{faGithub}from"@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons";import{faArrowLeft as faArrowLeftSolid}from"@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"../css/signin.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SignIn=()=>{const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{setTimeout(()=>{setLoading(false);},2000);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:loading?"loader":"login",children:loading?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"spinner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rect1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rect2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rect3"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rect4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rect5"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{onClick:()=>signInWithGithub(navigate),className:"github-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faGithub})," Sign in"," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"small-button",onClick:()=>window.location.href="/",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faArrowLeftSolid})," Back"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"https://github.com/C-iph3r/alpha-md",target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"github-link",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"small-button repo-button",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faGithub})," Repo"]})})]})]})});};export default SignIn;
